title: John Adams Institute supplement 2011/12
impactText: The funding been used to develop novel technologies for accelerating charged particles - these technologies are essential for creation of novel scientific instruments, technological devices and methods, as well as devices for medical use and patient treatment. Education,Electronics,Energy,Environment,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Societal,Economic
findingsText: We have discovered new ways for accelerating charged particles - these technologies are essential for creation of novel scientific instruments, technological devices and methods, as well as devices for medical use and patient treatment. One can build new generation scientific and medical instruments based on the developed principles and technologies.
